title: Denkalia
text: Denkalia was a <a href="Provinces%20of%20Eritrea">province of Eritrea</a> until 1996, when it was divided between present day <a href="Northern%20Red%20Sea%20Region">Northern Red Sea</a> and <a href="Southern%20Red%20Sea%20Region">Southern Red Sea</a> regions of Eritrea. Its capital was <a href="Assab">Assab</a>.
